summary: This is an email from a Paralegal Specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office to defense counsel regarding the second discovery production in the case U.S. v. Robert Adams (20 Cr. 494). It includes an attachment with a letter about the discovery materials, which are available on a secure file-sharing website.

events.title: Discovery Production Notification
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office notifies defense counsel of the second discovery production in the case U.S. v. Robert Adams.

keyFacts: This document is an email regarding discovery in the criminal case U.S. v. Robert Adams (20 Cr. 494).
The email is sent from a Paralegal Specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office to defense counsel Sam Gregory and Lloyd Epstein.
The discovery materials are available on a secure file-sharing website called USAfx.
The case involves Robert Adams as the defendant, though the specific charges are not detailed in this snippet.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings as of November 2020.
